\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\hypertarget{namespacesegmentation_1_1main_description}{}\doxysubsubsection{How to run}\label{namespacesegmentation_1_1main_description}
The segmentation code is ran like this\+:

\begin{quote}
python3 -\/m segmentation $<$npoints$>$ $<$fibrasdir$>$ $<$idsubj$>$ $<$atlasdir$>$ $<$atlas\+Information$>$ $<$result\+\_\+path$>$ \end{quote}
~\newline

\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{pathname}{pathname}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily segmentation.\+main.\+pathname = os.\+path.\+dirname(\+\_\+\+\_\+file\+\_\+\+\_\+)}



Variable that saves the absolute path of the file, so the executable /main can be run. 

It is not entered by the user. Variable que guarda la ruta absoluta del archivo, para poder correr el ejecutable /main. No es ingresado por el usuario. \mbox{\Hypertarget{namespacesegmentation_1_1main_a713c94cf41297bf79c16fb74f12c8cb0}\label{namespacesegmentation_1_1main_a713c94cf41297bf79c16fb74f12c8cb0}}

Directorio de salida para los fascículos segmentados del sujeto.
